Breakfast.title: Avocado Toast
Breakfast.description: A healthy and delicious breakfast option with avocado on whole-grain toast.
steps: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and mix with olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toast.
Serve immediately.

Breakfast.title: Pancakes
Breakfast.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and butter.
steps: Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add the milk and egg, and whisk until smooth.
Heat a pan and pour the batter to form pancakes.
Cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve with maple syrup and butter.

Breakfast.title: Smoothie Bowl
Breakfast.description: A refreshing and nutritious smoothie bowl topped with fruits and granola.
ingredients: Toppings: granola, sliced fruits, chia seeds
steps: Blend the banana, frozen berries, almond milk, and honey until smooth.
Pour the smoothie into a bowl.
Top with granola, sliced fruits, and chia seeds.
Serve immediately.

Breakfast.title: Blueberry Oatmeal
Breakfast.description: A warm and comforting bowl of oatmeal topped with fresh blueberries.
steps: In a saucepan, combine oats and milk. Cook over medium heat until the oats are soft and the mixture thickens.
Pour the oatmeal into a bowl.
Top with fresh blueberries, honey, and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
Serve warm.

Breakfast.title: Vegan Breakfast Burrito
Breakfast.description: A hearty and flavorful vegan burrito filled with tofu scramble and veggies.
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan. Add diced onions and bell peppers, and sauté until soft.
Crumble the tofu into the pan and add turmeric, salt, and pepper. Cook until the tofu is heated through.
Warm the tortilla in a separate pan.
Place the tofu scramble and black beans on the tortilla and roll it up.
Serve immediately.

Lunch.title: Grilled Chicken
Lunch.description: Juicy grilled chicken breast with a side of vegetables.
steps: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the chicken breasts with olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Grill the chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side.
Serve with your favorite vegetables.

Lunch.title: Caesar Salad
Lunch.description: A classic Caesar salad with crispy romaine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
steps: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
Toss the lettuce with croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and olive oil.
Serve immediately.

Lunch.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
Lunch.description: A quick and healthy stir-fry with mixed vegetables and soy sauce.
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add the broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot, and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and stir to combine.
Serve hot.

Lunch.title: Quinoa Salad
Lunch.description: A light and refreshing salad with quinoa, vegetables, and a lemon dressing.
steps: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve chilled.

Lunch.title: Chicken Wrap
Lunch.description: A quick and easy wrap filled with grilled chicken, lettuce, and a tangy sauce.
steps: In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise, mustard, and paprika to create the sauce.
Spread the sauce evenly over the tortilla.
Layer the sliced chicken and shredded lettuce on the tortilla.
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half.
Serve immediately.

Dinner.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
Dinner.description: A hearty Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté the onion until translucent.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

Dinner.title: Grilled Salmon
Dinner.description: Perfectly grilled salmon with a side of steamed vegetables.
steps: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Season the salmon fillets with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Grill the salmon for 4-5 minutes on each side.
Serve with steamed vegetables.

Dinner.title: Vegetable Lasagna
Dinner.description: A delicious vegetarian lasagna with layers of vegetables and cheese.
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Layer the lasagna sheets, ricotta cheese, marinara sauce, and vegetables in a baking dish.
Top with mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 25-30 minutes until golden and bubbly.
Serve hot.

Dinner.title: Vegetable Curry
Dinner.description: A flavorful and aromatic vegetable curry served with rice.
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan. Add the mixed vegetables and sauté for 5 minutes.
Add curry powder, turmeric, and salt. Stir to coat the vegetables.
Pour in the coconut milk and simmer for 10-15 minutes until the vegetables are tender.
Serve the curry over cooked rice.

Dinner.title: Beef Stir-Fry
Dinner.description: A quick and savory stir-fry with beef and mixed vegetables.
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan. Add beef strips and cook until browned.
Add broccoli and bell peppers, and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and sprinkle garlic powder. Stir to combine.
Serve hot.

Snacks.title: Trail Mix
Snacks.description: A healthy and energizing mix of nuts, seeds, and dried fruits.
steps: Combine all the ingredients in a bowl.
Mix well and store in an airtight container.
Enjoy as a snack.

Snacks.title: Yogurt Parfait
Snacks.description: A layered yogurt parfait with granola and fresh fruits.
steps: Layer the Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries in a glass.
Drizzle with honey.
Serve immediately.

Snacks.title: Hummus with Veggies
Snacks.description: A healthy snack of hummus served with fresh vegetables.
steps: Slice the vegetables into sticks.
Serve the hummus in a bowl with the sliced vegetables on the side.
Enjoy as a snack.

Snacks.title: Energy Balls
Snacks.description: No-bake energy balls made with oats, peanut butter, and honey.
steps: In a bowl, mix rolled oats, peanut butter, honey, chocolate chips, and vanilla extract.
Roll the mixture into small balls.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes to set.
Enjoy as a snack.

Snacks.title: Cheese and Crackers
Snacks.description: A simple and satisfying snack of cheese and whole-grain crackers.
steps: Arrange the cheese slices and crackers on a plate.
Add grapes on the side.
Serve immediately.
